name: Cattack: An Absolute Cattastrophe
description:
Controls: Point and click and/or arrow keys + enter key to interact with objects. Options in title screen; credits at end.

Buttercup's busted into the Highly Secure Detonation Station to launch missiles at the Bermuda Triangle. Can you help a cat save the world from the Illuminati?

This game's developed in 9 hours for the Trijam: The Ultimate Mega Extreme edition. Play time is 10 to 30 minutes, depending on if you move as quickly as possible, or if you look around for the secret gift and/or the second play-through.

Visit fey.earth to learn more about upcoming titles, including other short games, plus our OTB JRPG, Worlds They Dream.
